resources.string: Congratulations, you have won our artificial intelligence at the highest difficulty level.
Please email us any combination of gaming and the situation should we improve
The fragile girl good-looking - with lightning speed moves, run down to the enemy inflicts great damage in the melee. Under enemy fire quickly dies.
The sharp gangster - moves quickly and uses automatic Uzi in both hands for a fight at short distances. It causes great damage to the enemy, but can not stand for long under counter fire.
Solid man in sambrero - moves slowly and bravely withstand all attacks enemies. Armed with a gun with manual loading, so does a little damage to enemies.
The soldier, handsome, soul of the company - in calculating movements and aims to hit the enemy at medium and long distances. Well armed and equipped, it can withstand prolonged battles.
Severe biker, due to an accident is in a wheelchair and moves slowly. Safe feeling ranged, behind fellow is significant fire a bazooka.
These are your soldiers and send them to the enemy
This is the enemy base, it must be destroyed to win
